name: MEC 24 Hr Pack - Unisex
description:
Intelligent carry for your every day life. This pack holds everything you need for a full day on the go. Internal organization keeps your laptop, phone and tablet protected, yet easy to access.Made of durable and water-resistant polyester.Moulded foam shoulder straps and back panel have a stretch-woven overlay for comfort.2 zippered compartments open wide to swallow tons of stuff.Inner organizer pockets for batteries and cables, with a fleece-lined sleeve for a tablet.Dedicated laptop compartment with top zippered access.Front pocket has a fleece lining to protect your phone or sunnies.Side pocket holds a water bottle or umbrella.Hidden daisy chains can be deployed to attach extra gear or clip on a blinky bike light.Webbing strap on the back panel lets your pack ride on the handles of your rolling luggage.

        Sustainability
